direct link to the solution
to update the KRD virus database and definitions and make the update files remain even if restarted or shut down or run on other computers [http://reboot.pro/to...istro/?p=170160](http://reboot.pro/topic/18167-finally-i-found-the-best-linux-distro/?p=170160 "") clarifications: on step 13 *(to update the database and definitions)*, follow first steps 1-4 before proceeding to steps 9-10. other important details *(click on "show" beside the name "spoiler")* Spoiler SUMMARY OF IMPORTANT DETAILS:

1. to download PCLinuxOS
2. to download Parted Magic
3. to make PCLinuxOS persistent
4. to download Slax Linux just omit the /en if the page cannot be displayed or not found
5. to download and test different linux distos
6. to combine persistent parted magic and persistent slax linux on a flash drive
7. to download Kaspersky Rescue Disk and BitDefender Rescue Disk
8. to download fresh updated Kaspersky Rescue Disk or update the KRD iso file
9. to download and install Kaspersky Internet Security 2013 or latest
10. to download and install Malwarebytes Anti-Malware latest
